com.netflix.genie.server.metrics.impl

Class JobCountMonitorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.metrics.impl.JobCountMonitorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobCountMonitor, java.lang.Runnable

    public class JobCountMonitorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobCountMonitor
    Monitor thread that routinely updates the statistics object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JobCountMonitorImpl(GenieNodeStatistics stats, JobCountManager jobCountManager)
      Constructor.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Get number of jobs running on this instance.

      Get number of running jobs on this instance running for > 15 minutes.

      Get number of running jobs with 15m < runtime < 2 hours.
      int getNumInstanceJobs8Hrs()
      Get number of running jobs with 2h < runtime < hours.
      int getNumInstanceJobs8HrsPlus()
      Get number of running jobs with runtime > 8h.
      void run()
      The main run method for this thread - it runs for ever until explicitly shutdown.
      void setStop(boolean stop)
      Tell the monitor thread to stop running at next iteration.
